markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs=""
>
[Slippery Ribbon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=793)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Slithering</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 61</row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You succeed at an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29), but you don't have enough Speed to move all the way through the enemy's space

**Requirement** You are an expert in Acrobatics.
</row>

</column>

---

This ribbon is constantly greasy to the touch and stains the armor it's affixed to. When you activate the _slippery ribbon_, your Speed increases by an amount necessary for you to move all the way through the enemy's space.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Slippery Ribbon
requirement: You are an expert in Acrobatics.
requirement_markdown: You are an expert in Acrobatics.
